name: Grand Pabbie
subtitle: Oldest and Wisest
author: Juan Diego Leon

additional_info.title: FAQ 2
additional_info.body:
Q: If I control 3 damaged characters, one of which is Grand Pabbie - Oldest and Wisest, and I play Hakuna Matata, how much lore do I gain from the Ancient Insight ability of Grand Pabbie?

A: 6 lore. The Ancient Insight ability triggers once for each character healed, even if those characters were healed simultaneously.

flavor_text: When he talks, even the sky listens.
rules_text: ANCIENT INSIGHT Whenever you remove 1 or more damage from one of your characters, gain 2 lore.
